title: Spartacus (Bolshoi Ballet) [Widescreen]
brief_description: A Bolshoi Ballet performance in two acts of Spartacus by Aram Khachaturyan with choreography by Yuri Grigorovich and featuring dancers Vladimir Vassilyef, Natalya Bessmertnaya, Maris Lieppa, Nina Timofeeva and The Bolshoi Theatre Orchestra and Choir.
